#summary A glossary of Orchestra terms.

= Glossary =

*_Epoch Number_* global counter, similiar to a subversion revision number

*_Labelled Null_* different form SQL null - we can join on labelled nulls. They can be used when inferring new values though mappings. _1_ indicates there is no labeled null. All other values than _1_ are Skolem values. 

*_Publish_*

*_Reconcile_*

*_Reconcile Number_* another name for _Epoch Number_

*_State Store_* 

*_Update Exchange_*

*_Update Store_*
